products.title: Malta Charcoal Curtain

Grey is a stylish choice, and a trend that's not looking to go anywhere just yet. This fabric is beautiful for living rooms, dining rooms or bedrooms. Our made to measure curtains are all handmade within the UK and will provide a touch of luxury to your interior styling.

products.title: Velvet Steel Grey Curtain
products.metadescription: Velvet Steel Grey Curtain in Grey. Made to measure from £24.42 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Curtain includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Our soft-touch range of velvet fabrics add a touch of luxury and softness to your home. A multi-tonal fabric, our smooth velvet fabrics create depth when catching the light, and can create different looks depending on the time of day. From cosy winter mornings, to breezy summers, velvet fabrics have been a firm staple in home and fashion since the 1920s and 70s.
 This soft curtain in Steel Grey, adds a medium-grey hue to your home. A soft grey shade creates feeling of calm and warmth, this velvet grey curtain creates a decadent look for a fraction of the price on the high street. 
 At Swift Direct Blinds, not only is this curtain made by the experts at our Yorkshire factory, but with over 50 years experience, our curtains are made to last. Our curtains come with five year guarantee, for extra peace of mind, and customer-first service! 
 
 Product ID: DB-CUR1255 Fabric Colour: Steel Grey Material: 100% Polyester Lining: Light Filtering Poly/Cotton Blended Lining     Energy Saving Rating: ER2 - Medium Energy Saving Value - Increase to ER3 (High) By Adding Thermal Lining Light Filtering: Yes
